title: Erechtheion
description: The Erechtheion is a temple on the north side of the Athenian Acropolis dedicated to Athena Polias and other deities and heroes; the temple is of the Ionic order with several distinctive features, including its famous caryatid porch.

properties.description: Representative location of the Erechtheion on the Athenian acropolis, derived from analysis of Google Earth imagery.
properties.title: Imagery Location of the Erechtheion
